Title: Creating the certain offenses and provisions related to the unlawful dissemination of a personal image; and creates a private right of action for such offenses
Summary: Creates certain offenses and provisions related to the unlawful dissemination of a personal image; creates a private right of action for such offenses.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to creating the certain offenses and provisions related to the unlawful dissemination of a personal image; and to amend the civil rights law, in relation to creating a private right of action for such offenses
